title: Conversation
alt: Later, at home: 'Dear diary: Still can't figure out what to write here...'
transcript:
[Cueball and Megan are sitting at a table with drinks.]
Cueball: So, what do you do in your free time?[Close up on Megan's face.]
Megan: Mostly I sit around worrying someone will ask me that, and try to think of a good answer.[Back to original shot.]
Cueball: That's not a bad answer.
Megan: It's all I've got. Now that it's done, I should go. Bye!
[She gets up and leaves.]
